feed.title: IndustryBestPractice
feed.subtitle: The IndustryBestPractice team was born from a few InfoSec professionals trying to simplify security in an effective and cost effective manner.

entry.title: VulnMgmt
entry.content: This is a placeholder for an eventual post about Vulnerability Management, and some technical details around how to setup an effective program.
